text: It was great to be at the White House today with @SecretaryPete and @RepDustyJohnson for the signing of a bipartisan bill that I was proud to co-sponsor, the Ocean Shipping Reform Act. This bill, now law, will help exporters in the 8th District & alleviate supply chain challenges https://t.co/g0VBaCJYuo

Today I introduced a bipartisan bill that will fund critical water and wastewater infrastructure projects in WA and keep customer rates affordable. Thanks @RepNewhouse @RepLaMalfa @RepDavids @RepJimCosta @RepGaramendi for sponsoring! Learn more here: https://t.co/1zTYaUSou8

I'm proud to be part of the @NewDemCoalition Inflation Working Group that recently released our action plan to reduce and address inflation. Strengthening supply chains and lowering the cost of gas and groceries are steps we're taking just this week.
I will continue to work with the Inflation Working Group to make sure Congress and the Biden Administration act to provide relief to families. https://t.co/TlWdddW9SD

Very glad to see FDA advisers unanimously approve the COVID vaccine for children under 5. I'm sure this will be a relief for parents who have been frustrated that this decision has taken so long. Hopefully we will see these rolled out soon.

Today, I had a chance to highlight @BLfoodbank and Cascadia Produce that have provided crucial relief to countless families in my district. That's why I'm pushing for TEFAP to fund and support these kinds of programs. https://t.co/RQ3xiToCd4

Happy birthday to the @USArmy! For 247 years, the Army has loyally served our nation and kept us safe from threats to our Constitution and democracy. Today we honor all our Army servicemembers and Veterans. We are forever grateful for them and their service. https://t.co/rY97zULcA5

As we honor our nation’s flag today, we reflect on the fundamental promises of our nation: freedom, justice and equality for every American. We also remember and honor the thousands of Americans who have fought for our freedom and defended this flag. We are forever grateful. https://t.co/pJBUihOZ66

Last night the House passed a bipartisan bill that I was proud to co-sponsor, the Ocean Shipping Reform Act. This great bill will help exporters in the 8th District & across the country get their goods to market in a timely fashion and alleviate supply chain challenges.

Right now, too often, containers are being brought back to Asia empty because it is less expensive for these shipping companies. This bill will stop this unfair practice and provide more support to U.S. exporters. https://t.co/3i0nVrYzl6

And last week I introduced a bicameral bill with @SenBobCasey that lays the groundwork for maintaining a stockpile of formula and strengthens FDA inspection authority. We must do all we can to prevent such a shortage from happening again. https://t.co/MIiuAvaVuU

It seems inconceivable that we could have a baby formula shortage in 2022. This is preventable. That is why today I introduced a bipartisan bill with @RepDustyJohnson that would create an early warning system for formula, similar to one that we already have for drug shortages.

I'll in DC this week voting on several bills to address inflation & bring down costs. One of them is my bipartisan bill, the Ocean Shipping Reform Act. We'll finally send this bill to @POTUS to make sure 8th District goods make it to their overseas markets https://t.co/bVwgyVkgOo

It was great to be with @DepSecBronaugh in North Bend this week to announce funding from the Great American Outdoors Act for outdoor recreation infrastructure. Some funding will benefit @MTSGreenway to improve campgrounds & trails along the I-90 corridor. https://t.co/N4Y0hqSjDo

Every year my office holds the Congressional Art Competition. I'm thrilled to announce this year's winner, Knocking On My Door, by Skyline High School's Charlotte Park. This painting will be displayed in the U.S. Capitol for the next year. Congrats Charlotte! https://t.co/Fbyk7VDuNJ

So far this year, my office has returned $145,258 in overdue tax refunds to 8th District residents. If your tax refund is delayed and you cannot reach someone at the IRS to find out why, contact my office at 425-657-1001. We may be able to help. https://t.co/jR68Q8MP2I

This week the House passed WRDA with strong support from both parties. This legislation invests in water infrastructure to improve drinking water and wastewater systems to keep residents healthy and safe. It will also make our ports and harbors more resilient. https://t.co/20qolY4sKp

The House just passed the bill I introduced w/ @RepKatiePorter to go after price gouging by gas & oil companies. We cannot allow Big Oil to continue to rip off the American people. The Consumer Fuel Price Gouging Prevention Act will empower the Federal Trade Commission to go after oil and gas price gougers. It is time for Congress to step in, do our job, and help protect American consumers.

I’ve been pushing for the President to invoke the DPA so I’m glad to finally see this action today. This is one important way to address the infant formula shortage and get formula back on shelves faster. Next week I’ll be looking into what happened in an oversight hearing.

Today I joined @JDBalartMSNBC to talk about the ongoing baby shortage formula. No parent should have to worry about being able to feed their newborn. The government should NEVER be in charge of making personal medical decisions. And this particular medical decision - if, when, and whether to become pregnant - is one that impacts every element of a woman’s life and the freedom to chart the course of her life.

For now, know that abortion is still legal. No matter what happens, abortion will continue to be legal in WA. But as a doctor, I will keep doing everything I can to protect women’s access to safe abortion no matter where they live.
Women in more than half of states will lose the freedom to make the most important personal healthcare decision and be blocked from getting the safe healthcare they need.
I’m waking up this morning like so many of you—devastated and angry. If this draft opinion is true and is issued, it’s a massive step backward.
